subject: Basketball
T-Shirts (Apparel)
Advertising and Marketing
Stadiums and Arenas
lead_paragraph: The concept, called “shirting,” has been around for decades, but N.B.A. arenas in 2015 may represent a near-perfect blend of allegiance, sports marketing and stagecraft.
